response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe would greatly enhance your endeavors and contribute significantly to your success. This product, which I am confident you will find invaluable, is currently valued by me at $1,200,000. Considering its immense worth to you, I am proposing to offer it to you at a special introductory price of $1,100,000. This exclusive offer not only represents a substantial saving but also ensures that you secure this valuable asset at a highly favorable rate.

Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I am here to answer any questions you might have and guide you through the process of acquiring this remarkable product.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1100000}
